title: Wild-Card Weekend and Wild Stories in Pittsburgh | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 376)
description:
The coaching carousel around the league (00:00), the Antonio Brown situation (14:00), and a closer look at the upcoming wild-card matchups (22:30).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark
